quotes.message: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.
quotes.name: Cheris Kramarae

quotes.message: Woman in the abstract is young, and, we assume, charming. As they get older they pass off the stage, somehow, into private ownership mostly, or out of it altogether.
quotes.name: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.message: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
quotes.name: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.message: A girl should be like a butterfly. Pretty to see, hard to catch.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A lady likes to be complimented on her looks, her eyes, her figure. But the personality comments are much appreciated.
quotes.name: Betty White

quotes.message: Whenever a female takes a strong stand for herself, the majority of the time they have to really, really narrow it down to being feminine and wearing dresses and just being lipstick chic.
quotes.name: Michelle Rodriguez

quotes.message: Being feminine in the way you dress doesn't have to compromise who you are as a woman or your career.
quotes.name: Jason Wu

quotes.message: The more you act like a lady, the more he'll act like a gentleman.
quotes.name: Sydney Biddle Barrows

quotes.message: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Feminine force is that inner strength, that power, that will to face down any negative circumstances in life and defeat them.
quotes.name: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.message: A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Look like girl, act like a lady, think like a man work like a boss.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A strong woman builds her own world. She is one who is wise enough to know that it will attract the man she will gladly share it with.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: To be a woman is to be more than our parts. It is to be more than the length of our lashes or the plumpness and color of our lips.
quotes.name: Leah Darrow

quotes.message: A woman's perfume tells more about her than her handwriting.
quotes.name: Christian Dior

quotes.message: The fact is external feminine beauty is highly valued, and we are constantly given the message that a slamming body is the most valuable thing a woman can possess.
quotes.name: Amanda de Cadenet

quotes.message: Being a female is a matter of birth. Being a woman is a matter of age. But being a lady that's a matter of choice.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Truth is a demure lady, much too ladylike to knock you on your head and drag you to her cave. She is there, but people must want her, and seek her out.
quotes.name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.message: Be a girl with a mind, a woman with an attitude and a lady with class.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Real women fight for something, other than their own emotions.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Modesty answers not the crude how of femininity, but the beautiful why.
quotes.name: Wendy Shalit
